title.narrative: Puesto en funcionamiento un sistema nacional de proteccion social centrado en los mas vulnerables

description.narrative: UNICEF continued high level advocacy for the approval of the Social Protection System law and organized two rounds of consultations with important government partners to elaborate the need for a Social Protection System. | Status:Met | As-of Date:26/09/2018
